xwikidoc.content: #** * MyCurriki Favorites Profile Page * *# #** * MyCurriki Favorites Profile Page Content Call Back function * @param $userdoc Document of the user * @param $userobj Object of the user *# #macro(mycurriki_pagecontent $userdoc $userobj) #mycurriki_favoritesbox($userdoc $userobj) #end ## macro ## } #** * MyCurriki Favorites Profile Page Button Call Back function * @param $userdoc Document of the user * @param $userobj Object of the user *# #macro(mycurriki_pagebutton $userobj) ## { #mycurriki_favoritesbutton($userobj) #end ## button macro ## } ## ## Actual Display of page #mycurriki_page("favorites")
